title: Money is pouring into defense, but dual-use is the real sweet spot
summary: The article discusses the increasing focus of space companies on defense contracts due to rising defense budgets globally. It highlights the advantages of commercial space companies in providing innovative, agile, and cost-effective solutions for defense needs. The piece emphasizes the importance of dual-use technologies (civil and defense applications) for space companies to maximize revenue streams and resilience. ICEYE is mentioned as a successful example of a company leveraging dual-use capabilities, but no concrete deal or financial transaction involving ICEYE is described.

entities.name: ICEYE
entities.involvement: mentioned as a case study, not directly involved in a deal
